episode_summary: In this episode, Lou Adler discusses the unique strategies Real New York employs to recruit and retain top agents by providing exclusive opportunities and strong support. He emphasizes the importance of building relationships with developers and adapting to market changes, such as New York's evolving rent laws. Lou also highlights the role of AI in enhancing real estate operations and ensuring tenant quality.
